entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 1:30 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: W 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
